content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]ACCU-Beam® Laparoscope Couplers connect CO₂ laser articulating arms to a variety of operating laparoscopes. They are available in fixed focal and zoom configurations. Various laser thread adapters allow for compatibility with most CO₂ lasers, and laparoscope thread adapters allow for compatibility with most operating laparoscopes.

  • Aligns and focuses beam from laser to laparoscope
  • Available in fixed F400mm or F180-400mm zoom
  • Compatible with most lasers by utilizing thread adapters
  • Compatible with most laparoscopes by utilizing thread adapters
  • Sterilizable (excluding optics)

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72532″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1574290631274{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Laparoscope Couplers

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Our Laparoscope Couplers are a simple solution to connect the articulating arm of a CO₂ laser to almost any operating laparoscope. They function by connecting your choice of optics (F400 or zoom) to a thread adapter designed to the specifications of your laparoscope.

Like our other laser accessories the Laparoscope Couplers can be used with almost any laser’s articulating arm by taking advantage of our laser thread adapters. If you purchase a new laser in the future this thread adapter can be changed to work with it.

Part # 3125 – F400mm optics
Part # 3116 – F180-400mm Zoom optics
Part # 3113* – Various Laparoscope thread adapters (part number varies)[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d540efc-b975″][vc_column_text]Compatible with Storz, Stryker, Circon/AMCI, Elder, Wisap, Fiegert, Leisegang, Gynescope, Olympus, Cabot, Wolf, and other operating laparoscopes.

Compatible with Sharplan, NIIC, LaserSonics, Merrimack, Illumina, Coherent, Intermedic, Lumenis, Zeiss, SWOT, Ellman/Sandstone, Union, Lasering, DEKA, Syneron, Bison, JH Laser and many other lasers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3d0efc-b975″][vc_column_text]Laparoscope couplers are class 2 devices, and are approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014a0efc-b975″][vc_column_text] All of our products include a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product. [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
